text: NgeMini Aya kunidibanisela iMini yendibano Leyo yiMini yembandezelo. Nabani na okholwayo kuAllâh, enze izenzo ezilungileyo Yena (uAllâh) Uya kumsusela izenzo ezigwenxa kuye, Amngenise naseMiyezweni ekumpompoza kuyo imilambo ngaphantsi kwayo, apho baya kuhlala khona ngonaphakade. Leyo yiyona mpumelelo inkulu
